meanings.definition: To surpass in class or rank.
meanings.sent1: The student overclasses his classmates in math skills.
meanings.sent2: She overclasses her opponents in speed and agility.
meanings.sent3: The rabbit overclasses the turtle in the race, surprising everyone.
meanings.sent4: His determination overclasses any obstacles in his path.
meanings.sent5: The sun overclasses all other stars in brightness.

meanings.definition: A group or category that is above others in terms of social status or wealth.
meanings.sent1: The royal family is considered an overclasses in society.
meanings.sent2: The overclasses often live in luxurious mansions.
meanings.sent3: The overclasses threw an extravagant party to celebrate their success.
meanings.sent4: In the story, the evil queen represents the overclasses ruling over the common people.
meanings.sent5: The overclasses have access to exclusive clubs and events.
